Since the scattering intensity at frequencies corresponding to the A 1 is isotropic, it is convenient to get rid of overall geometrical factors by inspecting the E to A 1 intensity ratio instead of the E-mode intensity alone. The angular dependence of such ratio I 330/ I 277 of Raman scattering intensities at frequencies 330 and 277 cm −1, corresponding to the selected strong A 1 and E modes, is shown in Fig. 4 for several selected grains.
